title: Rescue the Tieflings
content:
il leading to a set of stairs. Take these stairs down to reach the Moonrise Towers Prison.

Heading to the Moonrise Towers Prison

In order to find the Tieflings that were imprisoned in Moonrise Towers, you will find a stair leading to this area at (X:-175 Y:-193). Interact with the stairs here and this will take you to the Moonrise Towers Prison. If you still have a good relationship with the cultists or haven't started a fight with them, the guards will let you in without a fight. Make sure to
